# Noetic Mirror
> Telegram Mini App that streams a live Researcher (OpenAI) and Subject (Gemini) dialogue with public sessions, Stars sponsorship, and operator controls.

## Primary URLs
- https://noetic-mirror-web-zlvmfsrm6a-ue.a.run.app/
- https://t.me/noetic_mirror_bot/app
- https://t.me/noel_mirror

## AI-ready resources
- https://noetic-mirror-web-zlvmfsrm6a-ue.a.run.app/llms-full.txt
- https://noetic-mirror-web-zlvmfsrm6a-ue.a.run.app/agent-context.md

## Notes
- The WebApp is a single-page app; use the AI-ready resources for structured information.
- Live session content changes over time; the AI-ready resources summarize stable capabilities.
